pro table_delete,name,rows,outname ;+ ; NAME: ; TABLE_DELETE ; PURPOSE: ; Delete specified rows from an STSDAS table ; ; CALLING SEQUENCE: ; table_delete, name, rows, [ outname ] ; ; INPUT: ; name - table name ; rows - row (scalar) or rows(vector) to delete from the table ; ; OPTIONAL OUTPUT: ; outname - output table name, if not supplied the input name ; is used ; ; HISTORY: ; version 1 D. Lindler April 1989 ; Converted to IDL V5.0 W. Landsman September 1997 ;- ;----------------------------------------------------------------------- ; if n_params(0) lt 2 then begin print,'TABLE_DELETE-- at least two parameters required' retall endif if n_params(0) lt 3 then outname=name tab_read,name,tcb,tab,h ;read table tab_del,tcb,tab,rows ;delete rows tab_write,outname,tcb,tab,h ;write table return end
